name: DEVSATRequirementsResponder
title: Developer Satisfaction Requirements for the Responder Actor
description: Developer Satisfaction Requirements for the Responder Actor

statement.label: capstmt-1
statement.requirement: The Developer Satisfaction Responder SHALL support the CapabilityStatement metadata operation and return a valid CapabilityStatement conformant to the base FHIR specification.

statement.label: capstmt-2
statement.requirement: The Developer Satisfaction Responder SHALL support the CapabilityStatement metadata operation and return a valid CapabilityStatement that instantiates the Developer Satisfaction Responder CapabilityStatement.

statement.label: read-devsat-goal-1
statement.requirement: The Developer Satisfaction Responder SHALL support the Goal read operation and return a valid Goal conformant to the Developer Satisfaction Goal Profile.

statement.label: read-devsat-observation-1
statement.requirement: The Developer Satisfaction Responder SHALL support the Observation read operation and return a valid Observation conformant to the Developer Satisfaction Observation Profile.

statement.label: get-satisfaction-1
statement.requirement: The Developer Satisfaction Responder SHALL support responding to a Developer Satisfaction $get-satisfaction operation with a conformant output Parameters.
